sub_title: Engagement Executive | Marketing | Digital | Event Planning | Project Management
summary:
As a highly skilled marketing and events coordinator with 10 years of experience across various industries, I am seeking to transition my skills and expertise to a career in project management. With a proven track record of success in developing, executing, and managing events, and developing communication strategies, I am confident that I can contribute to the marketing communication campaigns and drive results through creative and innovative approaches to increase product adoption.

My most recent role as a Marketing Coordinator at Coloplast allowed me to develop my project management skills by managing all Coloplast South Africa events, working with international marketing teams to manage marketing collateral for the region, assisting representatives with all queries, and designing marketing material. In this role, I led the digital team in migrating the Coloplast South Africa website from an old format to a new one, launched campaigns that increased customer reach by 20%, increased conversion rate by 40%, and captured 1300 new leads on digital platforms. I also developed event strategies and worked with third-party vendors to provide better quality events while making a 23% saving.

In my previous roles, I successfully managed projects and events for Genop Healthcare and the British High Commission, UK Trade and Investment, where I managed events from inception to completion, created and managed guest lists, identified potential service providers, and managed marketing collateral. Additionally, I have a strong understanding of company products driven by business and customer support for B2C application and have experience in the tender process to government and private organizations.

I hold a Bachelor of Commerce Honours degree in Marketing/Marketing Management from the Management College of Southern Africa (MANCOSA) and a B Com University degree in Business, Management, Marketing, and Related Support Services from the University of KwaZulu-Natal. I have also completed certifications in The Fundamentals of Digital Marketing and Google Analytics for Beginners from Google Digital Garage and Google Analytics Academy, respectively.

With my expertise in event management, marketing, event planning, marketing management, research, project planning, business strategy, coordinating events, market research, customer service, marketing communications planning, brand awareness, marketing communications, CRM, and project management, I am confident that I can contribute to your team's success in any project.

education.field_of_study: Business, Management, Marketing, and Related Support Services

school.name: The Management College of Southern Africa (MANCOSA)

courses.name: Introduction in Desktop Publishing and Design

profile_positions.description:
•	Project managed all Coloplast South Africa events and developed events strategies, working with third-party vendors to provide better quality events while making a 23% saving.
•	Worked with international marketing teams to manage marketing collateral for the region and designed marketing material.
•	Assisted representatives with all queries and provided Marketing Support across all South African regions.
•	Achieved new customer growth by leading the digital team (Poland-based) in migrating the Coloplast South Africa website from an old format to a new one and launching campaigns that increased customer reach by 20%, increased conversion rate by 40%, and captured 1300 new leads on digital platforms.
•	Researched and identified new avenues to grow the customer base.
•	Coordinated team efforts for successful conference organization and webinar management.
•	Analyzed data to gain insights and used analytical skills to improve marketing efforts.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
•	Managed consignment inventory via the online application, ensuring timely returns of stock and usage reports.
•	Coordinated cases to support effective stock management.
•	Led the project management of all events for Genop South Africa, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality events that exceeded attendance and revenue targets.
•	Assisted representatives with all queries, providing exceptional customer service to maintain high levels of satisfaction.
•	Engaged with customers on product information and various marketing activities, contributing to the development of effective marketing strategies and campaigns.
•	Managed the tender process to government and private organizations, winning multi-million Rand tenders through strong negotiation skills and a deep understanding of customer needs.
•	Demonstrated strong business acumen by driving B2B sales, while supporting B2C applications.
•	Utilized Salesforce.com and Microsoft Excel to manage data, monitor trends, and track progress.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
• Managing an event from inception to completion (this includes the production of name tags, place cards etc).
• Creating and managing guest lists.
• Identifying potential service providers.
• Uploading event and other information onto team website.
• Creating a record on CRM software of all events and attendees at events.
• Providing budgets with regards to specific events.
• Updating publication stock by ordering in new publications as and when they become available.
• Creating invitations on platform.
• Providing assistance as part of the reception staff at events to greet attendees and direct them.
• Marketing administration, procurement and distribution of corporate items.
• Liaising with on-site hosts and any third party hosts regarding room set up, AV collateral and catering.
• Showing above average proficiency in MS Office package with strong points being Excel, Word and Powerpoint.
profile_positions.title: Marketing and events co-ordinator

profile_positions.location: City of Johannesburg, Gauteng, South Africa
profile_positions.description:
• Follow all leads given and to engage in cold calling of potential clients.
• Collation of raw data and the management of this data and the submission thereof.
• Compile all data correctly with regards to layout and content.
• Be the first point of contact for potential customers and therefore a professional image needs to be maintained under all circumstances.
• Meeting weekly targets and ensuring that potential clients are open to the prospect of engaging in business with the company.
profile_positions.title: Data Generator

profile_positions.description:
• Primary contact for customers and external service providers.
• Booking and coordinating meetings.
• Greet and direct visitors.
• Keep records of visits, meetings and contacts.
• Research new market opportunities.
• Map out potential customers and competitors.
• Determine unmet needs and market structure.
• Contact and conduct initial follow-ups on sales prospects.
• Co-ordinate with technical groups to facilitate marketing functions.
• Provide status reports to management on sales and marketing activities.
• Create and modify documents on MS Office suite.
• Setup and co-ordinate meetings and conferences.
• Screening calls.
• General office admin.
• Tracking budgets and expenses.
• Assist in researching markets and competitors.
• Assist with admin of ongoing National Sales and Marketing.
• Prepare draft presentations as and when required.
• Assist in development of various Sales and Marketing admin initiatives.
• Any other suitable alternative work should the operational need arise.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Assistant

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for outgoing and incoming mail.
• Compile Cheque Requisitions in order to pay suppliers.
profile_positions.title: Administration Assistant/ Accounts Clerk
